verbose_text: Among a number of PI4P binding, Golgi localized proteins, knockdown of OSBP, but not any of the other PH domain containing proteins, enhanced the inhibitory effect of a low concentration (1.25 muM) of ITZ on PV replication (XREF_FIG A), implying OSBP as a possible antiviral target of ITZ.
evidence: OSBP, but not any of the other PH domain-containing proteins, enhanced the inhibitory effect of a low concentration (1.25 muM) of ITZ
